name: Drill Billy
description:
New job employmend for you pal.

The company wants you to reach our planets core to farm some excotic materials.
But keep one thing in mind. The deeper you dig, the temperature increase and obstacles get thougher and thougher. So dont forget to frequently update your drill.

Good luck pal, you will need it.

To be able to acquire the newest Upgrades collect Gold and Diamonds and ohter precious resources.

Have fun!
